A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointing! It really upsets me the complete disregard to the legend that Luke Skywalker was. So many plot holes\, it almost seems like the writers forgot to watch the Force Awakens or even the prequels and the originals. Getting rid of our beloved characters in meaningless ways. Just ruined the trilogy completely. Beautiful cinematography but story SUCKS! I will never watch this piece of crap again!
